remarks: Lemma for ~ lhpexle1 and others that eliminates restrictions on ` X ` . (Contributed by NM, 24-Jul-2013.)
statement:
lhpexle1lem.1 $e |- ( ph -> E. p e. A ( p .<_ W /\ ps ) ) $.
lhpexle1lem.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( X e. A /\ X .<_ W ) ) -> E. p e. A ( p .<_ W /\ ps /\ p =/= X ) ) $.
lhpexle1lem $p |- ( ph -> E. p e. A ( p .<_ W /\ ps /\ p =/= X ) ) $.
$d .<_ p $.
$d A p $.
$d W p $.
$d X p $.
$d p ph $.
